titleStmt.title: The abridgement of the English Chronicle, first collected by M. Iohn Stow, and after him augmented with very many memorable antiquities, and continued with matters forreine and domesticall, vnto the beginning of the yeare, 1618. by E.H. Gentleman. There is a briefe table at the end of the booke
Summarie of Englyshe chronicles. Abridgments
titleStmt.author: Stow, John, 1525?-1605.

titleStmt.title: The abridgement of the English Chronicle, first collected by M. Iohn Stow, and after him augmented with very many memorable antiquities, and continued with matters forreine and domesticall, vnto the beginning of the yeare, 1618. by E.H. Gentleman. There is a briefe table at the end of the booke
Summarie of Englyshe chronicles. Abridgments
titleStmt.author: Stow, John, 1525?-1605.
Howes, Edmund, fl. 1607-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Edward Allde and Nicholas Okes] for the Company of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: An abridgment of "A summarie of Englyshe chronicles" (STC 23319-23325.2).
E.H. = Edmund Howes, whose name appears on A3r.
Allde printed through quire U; Okes the rest (STC).
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
